titles.title: Save our Border Communities Act of 2011
To authorize Federal payment to first responders for costs associated with providing emergency services at the international borders of the United States, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 2/15/2011--Introduced. Save our Border Communities Act of 2011 - Directs the Secretary of Homeland Security (DHS) to provide payment to first responders for costs associated with providing emergency services at U.S. international borders, but only to the extent that such costs are not otherwise reimbursed through any federal program and cannot otherwise be recovered.
